entry.content:
At Apple I had the chance to learn a lot of deep learning while working with the team that develops its DNN toolkit. Today I have open-sourced my personal studies:

  • ğŸš€ My Resources for AI, ML, and DNN.
  • ğŸ›° CUDA Studies for Deep Learning Problems.

Additionally, when I was in my PhD I had the pleasure of doing some nice work on Machine Learning as well. Here is the open-sourced code for you:

  • ğŸ’Advanced Machine Learning.
  • ğŸ­ MLNet - Classifying Complex Networks with ML.
  • ğŸ”‹ NetClean - Complex Networks Data-Cleanser.
  • ğŸŒº NetAna - Complex Network Analysis Package.

Enjoy and let me know what you think! :)
